Title: The Shallows
Overview: When Nancy is surfing on a secluded beach, she finds herself on the feeding ground of a great white shark. Though she is stranded only 200 yards from shore, survival proves to be the ultimate test of wills, requiring all of Nancy's ingenuity, resourcefulness, and fortitude.
Tagline: What was once in the deep is now in the shallows.
Keywords: mexico, beach, surfer, island, survival, young woman, shark, great white shark, trapped, animal attack, animal horror, prey
production_companies: Columbia Pictures, Ombra Films, Weimaraner Republic Pictures
Cast: Blake Lively, Óscar Jaenada, Angelo Josue Lozano Corzo
